content: Automatic file indexing disabled in the room

comment.text: This translation key is used for the UI message that indicates automatic file indexing is disabled in a room. It appears when the user interacts with settings or options related to file management or room features.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'تفعيل الفهرسة التلقائية للملفات معطل في الغرفة' literally translates to 'Automatic file indexing activation is disabled in the room.' It's a bit awkward and less natural than a more direct translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: تُعطِّل الفهرسة التلقائية للملفات في الغرفة

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the phrasing 'تفعيل الفهرسة' (activation of indexing) can be simplified.

The translation 'Vypnutí automatického indexování souborů v místnosti' is a bit too literal. 'Vypnutí' (switch off) implies an action performed, whereas the English says the feature is disabled (a state).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Automatické indexování souborů v místnosti je vypnuto

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Έγινε απενεργοποίηση της αυτόματης ευρετηρίασης αρχείων στο δωμάτιο" is a bit wordy and passive. A more direct and natural translation would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Η αυτόματη ευρετηρίαση αρχείων απενεργοποιήθηκε στο δωμάτιο

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "ルーム内での自動ファイルインデックス作成が無効になりました" is a bit literal and not the most natural way to express the English meaning. While technically correct, it sounds a bit clunky in Japanese.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ルームの自動ファイルインデックスが無効になりました (Rūmu no jidō fairu indekkusu ga mēi ni narimashita)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly literal and doesn't flow naturally in Lao. 'ການນໍາໃຊ້ການຄົ້ນຫາເອກະສານແບບອັດຕະໂນມັດຖືກປິດການນໍາໃຊ້' is verbose. A more natural phrasing would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການຄົ້ນຫາເອກະສານແບບອັດຕະໂນມັດປິດໃຊ້ໃນຫ້ອງນີ້

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repetition of 'ການນໍາໃຊ້' is grammatically awkward in Lao.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການຄົ້ນຫາເອກະສານແບບອັດຕະໂນມັດປິດໃຊ້ໃນຫ້ອງນີ້

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ficheiros' could be improved for a more natural flow in Brazilian Portuguese. 'Arquivos' is a common alternative.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Indexação automática de arquivos desativada na sala

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "pentru această sală" sounds slightly awkward in this context. A more natural phrasing would be "în această sală".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Indexarea automată a fișierelor este dezactivată în această sală

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'දර්ශනය' (darshanaya) which translates to 'view' or 'display' is not the most accurate translation of 'indexing' in this context. It suggests showing the files rather than cataloging them.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: කාමරයේ ස්වයංක්‍රීය ගොනු ලේඛනය අක්‍රිය කර ඇත

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ලේඛනය' (lekhinaya) translates to 'record' or 'register'. While not a perfect equivalent to 'indexing', it conveys the idea of creating a catalog or record of files more accurately than 'දර්ශනය'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: කාමරයේ ස්වයංක්‍රීය ගොනු ලේඛනය අක්‍රිය කර ඇත

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'фајлова' should be 'фајлова'. The Serbian Cyrillic alphabet does not have a 'j' in this context.

The translation 'Tự động lập chỉ mục tập tin đã bị vô hiệu hóa trong phòng' is technically correct but a bit formal and clunky for this context. 'Lập chỉ mục' is a direct translation of 'indexing' and can sound overly technical.  A more natural phrasing would be something like 'Tự động lập danh mục tập tin đã bị tắt trong phòng' or 'Tự động lập chỉ mục tập tin đã tắt trong phòng'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tự động lập danh mục tập tin đã bị tắt trong phòng
